title: Snowbound
description: Hayden Berry is lost in a small South Dakota town after crashing his car, when he is rescued by Deputy Sheriff Dylan Hubble and taken home for the night. One night turns into two when they are snowed in and instant attraction turns into life-long love.But Hayden isn't free to be with Dylan and he leaves, the memory of that winter casting a shadow over the rest of his life...
author: Scarlet Blackwell
